newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: CZECH BICS100 BOND INDEX FALLS 0.009PTS TO 103.277.
newsitem.headline: CZECH BICS100 BOND INDEX FALLS 0.009PTS TO 103.277.

text.p: The BICS 100 index measuring the Czech Republic's most liquid bonds fell 0.009 points in Wednesday's trading to 103.277 points, bank Ceska Sporitelna said.
It said the duration of the index portfolio shortened by 0.003 points to 2.785 years.

The BICSG 100 index, which Ceska Sporitelna calculates using only government bonds, rose 0.016 points to 100.925, the bank said, and the duration of the index portfolio shortened by 0.003 points to 2.326 years.
It said the yield index YBICS 1000 fell 0.148 points to 1,023.473.
